markers.Title: Armoury
markers.Description: Building used to safely store munitions.

markers.Title: Airfield Site
markers.Description: Airfield site brought by the war departmentr in 1913, and used from 1915 by the Armament Experimental Flight branch of the Central Flying School

markers.Title: The Black Beacon
markers.Description: Built in 1928 to house an experimental navigation beacon, later used to track bombing trials
